Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Corporal ornament
Description: These jewels come from the isolated grave of a young child at Mirgissa/Iken and were worn around the neck.  A spherical bead of black paste, a ring-shaped bead of carnelian, a blue enamel amulet in the shape of a bird, another of this same material that could be a second bird, and a lovely carnelian amulet depicting a seated baboon.
